title: Jai Bhim
simple_desc: When a tribal man is arrested for a case of alleged theft, his wife turns to a human-rights lawyer to help bring justice.

title: The Green Mile
simple_desc: A tale set on death row in a Southern jail, where gentle giant John possesses the mysterious power to heal people's ailments. When the lead guard, Paul, recognizes John's gift, he tries to help stave off the condemned man's execution.

title: Se7en
simple_desc: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

title: Spirited Away
simple_desc: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches and spirits, a world where humans are changed into beasts.

title: Harakiri
simple_desc: When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

title: The Prestige
simple_desc: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians in 1890s London engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

title: The Usual Suspects
simple_desc: The sole survivor of a pier shoot-out tells the story of how a notorious criminal influenced the events that began with five criminals meeting in a seemingly random police lineup.

title: Psycho
simple_desc: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

title: Rear Window
simple_desc: A photographer in a wheelchair spies on his neighbors from his Greenwich Village courtyard apartment window, and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder, despite the skepticism of his fashion-model girlfriend.

title: Apocalypse Now
simple_desc: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

title: Oldboy
simple_desc: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

title: Memento
simple_desc: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

title: Coco
simple_desc: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

title: The Lives of Others
simple_desc: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

title: Witness for the Prosecution
simple_desc: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

title: High and Low
simple_desc: An executive of a Yokohama shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped by mistake and held for ransom.

title: North by Northwest
simple_desc: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and falls for a woman whose loyalties he begins to doubt.
stars: ['Cary Grant', 'Eva Marie Saint', 'James Mason', 'Jessie Royce Landis']

title: Incendies
simple_desc: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

title: Vertigo
simple_desc: A former San Francisco police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with the hauntingly beautiful woman he has been hired to trail, who may be deeply disturbed.

title: Citizen Kane
simple_desc: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance: 'Rosebud.'

title: M
simple_desc: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

title: Double Indemnity
simple_desc: A Los Angeles insurance representative lets an alluring housewife seduce him into a scheme of insurance fraud and murder that arouses the suspicion of his colleague, an insurance investigator.

title: Raatchasan
simple_desc: A sub-inspector sets out in pursuit of a mysterious serial killer who targets teen school girls and murders them brutally.

title: Shutter Island
simple_desc: Teddy Daniels and Chuck Aule, two US marshals, are sent to an asylum on a remote island in order to investigate the disappearance of a patient, where Teddy uncovers a shocking truth about the place.

title: The Father
simple_desc: A man refuses all assistance from his daughter as he ages. As he tries to make sense of his changing circumstances, he begins to doubt his loved ones, his own mind and even the fabric of his reality.

title: The Thing
simple_desc: A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

title: The Sixth Sense
simple_desc: Malcolm Crowe, a child psychologist, starts treating a young boy, Cole, who encounters dead people and convinces him to help them. In turn, Cole helps Malcolm reconcile with his estranged wife.

title: L.A. Confidential
simple_desc: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

title: Chinatown
simple_desc: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer in 1930s Los Angeles finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

title: The Secret in Their Eyes
simple_desc: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

title: Drishyam 2
simple_desc: A gripping tale of an investigation and a family which is threatened by it. Will Vijay Salgaonkar be able to protect his family this time?

title: Andhadhun
simple_desc: A series of mysterious events change the life of a blind pianist, who must now report a crime that he should technically know nothing of.

title: Rashomon
simple_desc: The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter.

title: Drishyam
simple_desc: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

title: Prisoners
simple_desc: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts.

title: Jaws
simple_desc: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community off Cape Cod, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
simple_desc: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

title: Gone Girl
simple_desc: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

title: Memories of Murder
simple_desc: In a small Korean province in 1986, two detectives struggle with the case of multiple young women being found raped and murdered by an unknown culprit.

title: Rebecca
simple_desc: A self-conscious woman juggles adjusting to her new role as an aristocrat's wife and avoiding being intimidated by his first wife's spectral presence.

title: The Third Man
simple_desc: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

title: Three Colors: Red
simple_desc: A model discovers a retired judge is keen on invading people's privacy.

title: Diabolique
simple_desc: The wife and mistress of a loathed school principal plan to murder him with what they believe is the perfect alibi.

title: Talvar
simple_desc: An experienced investigator confronts several conflicting theories about the perpetrators of a violent double homicide.

title: A Wednesday
simple_desc: A retiring police officer reminisces about the most astounding day of his career. About a case that was never filed but continues to haunt him in his memories - the case of a man and a Wednesday.

title: Article 15
simple_desc: In the rural heartlands of India, an upright police officer sets out on a crusade against violent caste-based crimes and discrimination.

title: The Tashkent Files
simple_desc: Revolves around the mysterious death of India's 2nd Prime Minister Shri Lal Bahadur Shastri and attempts to uncover if he had actually died a natural death, or, as alleged, was assassinated.

title: Kahaani
simple_desc: A pregnant woman's search for her missing husband takes her from London to Kolkata, but everyone she questions denies having ever met him.

title: Blade Runner 2049
simple_desc: Young Blade Runner K's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

title: Donnie Darko
simple_desc: After narrowly escaping a bizarre accident, a troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes.

title: Zootopia
simple_desc: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

title: 12 Monkeys
simple_desc: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

title: The Bourne Ultimatum
simple_desc: Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless C.I.A. official and his Agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.

title: Perfect Blue
simple_desc: A pop singer gives up her career to become an actress, but she slowly goes insane when she starts being stalked by an obsessed fan and what seems to be a ghost of her past.

title: The Invisible Guest
simple_desc: A successful entrepreneur accused of murder and a witness preparation expert have less than three hours to come up with an impregnable defense.

title: Chungking Express
simple_desc: Two melancholy Hong Kong policemen fall in love: one with a mysterious female underworld figure, the other with a beautiful and ethereal waitress at a late-night restaurant he frequents.

title: Solaris
simple_desc: A psychologist is sent to a station orbiting a distant planet in order to discover what has caused the crew to go insane.

title: The Maltese Falcon
simple_desc: San Francisco private detective Sam Spade takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar and their quest for a priceless statuette, with the stakes rising after his partner is murdered.

title: Infernal Affairs
simple_desc: A story between a mole in the police department and an undercover cop. Their objectives are the same: to find out who is the mole, and who is the cop.
stars: ['Andy Lau', 'Tony Leung Chiu-wai', 'Anthony Chau-Sang Wong', 'Eric Tsang']

title: Anatomy of a Murder
simple_desc: An upstate Michigan lawyer defends a soldier who claims he killed an innkeeper due to temporary insanity after the victim raped his wife. What is the truth, and will he win his case?

title: The Cabinet of Dr. Caligari
simple_desc: Hypnotist Dr. Caligari uses a somnambulist, Cesare, to commit murders.

title: Sleuth
simple_desc: A man who loves games and theater invites his wife's lover to meet him, setting up a battle of wits with potentially deadly results.

title: The Blue Elephant
simple_desc: While trying to help an inmate at the mental hospital, a psychotherapist unravels mysteries he never thought existed.

title: Knives Out
simple_desc: A detective investigates the death of the patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.
stars: ['Daniel Craig', 'Chris Evans', 'Ana de Armas', 'Jamie Lee Curtis']

title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
simple_desc: Harry Potter, Ron and Hermione return to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry for their third year of study, where they delve into the mystery surrounding an escaped prisoner who poses a dangerous threat to the young wizard.

title: Arrival
simple_desc: A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.

title: Mulholland Drive
simple_desc: After a car wreck on the winding Mulholland Drive renders a woman amnesiac, she and a perky Hollywood-hopeful search for clues and answers across Los Angeles in a twisting venture beyond dreams and reality.

title: The Bourne Identity
simple_desc: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.

title: Mystic River
simple_desc: The lives of three men who were childhood friends are shattered when one of them has a family tragedy.

title: The Big Sleep
simple_desc: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a wealthy family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail and what might be love.

title: In the Heat of the Night
simple_desc: A black Philadelphia police detective is mistakenly suspected of a local murder while passing through a racially hostile Mississippi town, and after being cleared is reluctantly asked by the police chief to investigate the case.

title: Ghost in the Shell
simple_desc: A cyborg policewoman and her partner hunt a mysterious and powerful hacker called the Puppet Master.

title: The Man from Earth
simple_desc: An impromptu goodbye party for Professor John Oldman becomes a mysterious interrogation after the retiring scholar reveals to his colleagues he has a longer and stranger past than they can imagine.

title: Charade
simple_desc: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Whom can she trust?

title: Rope
simple_desc: Two men attempt to prove they committed the perfect crime by hosting a dinner party after strangling their former classmate to death.

title: Three Colors: Blue
simple_desc: A woman struggles to find a way to live her life after the death of her husband and child.

title: Talk to Her
simple_desc: Two men share an odd friendship while they care for two women who are both in deep comas.

title: Mildred Pierce
simple_desc: A hard-working mother inches towards disaster as she divorces her husband and starts a successful restaurant business to support her spoiled daughter.

title: Laura
simple_desc: A police detective falls in love with the woman whose murder he is investigating.

title: The Thin Man
simple_desc: Former detective Nick Charles and his wealthy wife Nora investigate a murder case, mostly for the fun of it.

title: Ugly
simple_desc: The case of a missing girl takes us through a journey of human greed and brushes upon the egos and repressed emotions of the characters.

title: In a Lonely Place
simple_desc: A potentially violent screenwriter is a murder suspect until his lovely neighbor clears him. However, she soon starts to have her doubts.

title: About Elly
simple_desc: The mysterious disappearance of a kindergarten teacher during a picnic in the north of Iran is followed by a series of misadventures for her fellow travelers.

title: Get Out
simple_desc: A young African-American visits his White girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.

title: The Hateful Eight
simple_desc: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.
stars: ['Samuel L. Jackson', 'Kurt Russell', 'Jennifer Jason Leigh', 'Walton Goggins']

title: Atonement
simple_desc: Thirteen-year-old fledgling writer Briony Tallis irrevocably changes the course of several lives when she accuses her older sister's lover of a crime he did not commit.

title: Hot Fuzz
simple_desc: A skilled London police officer, after irritating superiors with his embarrassing effectiveness, is transferred to a village where the easygoing officers object to his fervor for regulations, as a string of grisly murders strikes the town.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
simple_desc: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for 40 years by young computer hacker Lisbeth Salander.

title: The Fugitive
simple_desc: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt led by a seasoned U.S. Marshal.

title: Big Hero 6
simple_desc: A special bond develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who together team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

title: Moon
simple_desc: Astronaut Sam Bell has a quintessentially personal encounter toward the end of his three-year stint on the Moon, where he, working alongside his computer, GERTY, sends back to Earth parcels of a resource that has helped diminish our planet's power problems.

title: The Conversation
simple_desc: A paranoid, secretive surveillance expert has a crisis of conscience when he suspects that the couple he is spying on will be murdered.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
simple_desc: A journalist is aided by a young female hacker in his search for the killer of a woman who has been dead for forty years.

title: The Best Offer
simple_desc: A lonely art expert working for a mysterious and reclusive heiress finds not only her art worth examining.

title: Mississippi Burning
simple_desc: Two F.B.I. Agents with wildly different styles arrive in Mississippi to investigate the disappearance of some civil rights activists.

title: Changeling
simple_desc: Grief-stricken mother Christine Collins takes on the L.A.P.D. to her own detriment when they try to pass off an obvious impostor as her missing child.

title: Mother
simple_desc: A mother desperately searches for the killer who framed her son for a girl's horrific murder.

title: Gaslight
simple_desc: Ten years after her aunt was murdered in their London home, a woman returns from Italy in the 1880s to resume residence with her new husband. His obsessive interest in the home rises from a secret that may require driving his wife insane.

title: Loving Vincent
simple_desc: In a story depicted in oil painted animation, a young man comes to the last hometown of painter Vincent van Gogh to deliver the troubled artist's final letter and ends up investigating his final days there.

title: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
simple_desc: Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.
directors: ['Eric Radomski', 'Kevin Altieri', 'Boyd Kirkland', 'Frank Paur', 'Dan Riba', 'Bruce Timm']

title: The White Ribbon
simple_desc: Strange events happen in a small village in the north of Germany during the years before World War I, which seem to be ritual punishment. Who is responsible?

title: Great Expectations
simple_desc: A humble orphan boy in 1810s Kent is given the opportunity to go to London and become a gentleman, with the help of an unknown benefactor.

title: Badla
simple_desc: A dynamic young entrepreneur finds herself locked in a hotel room with the corpse of her dead lover. She hires a prestigious lawyer to defend her and they work together to figure out what actually happened.

title: L'Avventura
simple_desc: A woman disappears during a Mediterranean boating trip. During the search, her lover and her best friend become attracted to each other.

title: The Ghost and Mrs. Muir
simple_desc: In 1900, a young widow finds her seaside cottage is haunted and forms a unique relationship with the ghost.

title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
simple_desc: Harry Potter finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic, but he is distracted by recurring nightmares.

title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
simple_desc: As Harry, Ron and Hermione race against time and evil to destroy the Horcruxes, they uncover the existence of the three most powerful objects in the wizarding world: the Deathly Hallows.

title: Wind River
simple_desc: A wildlife officer, who is haunted by a tragedy that happened because of him, teams up with an FBI agent in solving a murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation and hopes to get redemption from his past regrets.

title: Zodiac
simple_desc: Between 1968 and 1983, a San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac Killer, an unidentified individual who terrorizes Northern California with a killing spree.

title: Primal Fear
simple_desc: An altar boy is accused of murdering a priest, and the truth is buried several layers deep.

title: The Game
simple_desc: After a wealthy San Francisco banker is given an opportunity to participate in a mysterious game, his life is turned upside down as he begins to question if it might really be a concealed conspiracy to destroy him.

title: Blue Velvet
simple_desc: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.

title: The Bourne Supremacy
simple_desc: When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.

title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
simple_desc: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

title: Glengarry Glen Ross
simple_desc: An examination of the machinations behind the scenes at a real estate office.

title: The Name of the Rose
simple_desc: An intellectually nonconformist friar investigates a series of mysterious deaths in an isolated abbey.

title: Paprika
simple_desc: When a machine that allows therapists to enter their patients' dreams is stolen, all hell breaks loose. Only a young female therapist, Paprika, can stop it.

title: The Vanishing
simple_desc: Rex and Saskia, a young couple in love, are on vacation. They stop at a busy service station and Saskia is abducted. After three years and no sign of Saskia, Rex begins receiving letters from the abductor.

title: The Double Life of Véronique
simple_desc: Two parallel stories about two identical women; one living in Poland, the other in France. They don't know each other, but their lives are nevertheless profoundly connected.

title: Open Your Eyes
simple_desc: A very handsome man finds the love of his life, but he suffers an accident and needs to have his face rebuilt by surgery after it is severely disfigured.

title: When Marnie Was There
simple_desc: Due to 12 y.o. Anna's asthma, she's sent to stay with relatives of her guardian in the Japanese countryside. She likes to be alone, sketching. She befriends Marnie. Who is the mysterious, blonde Marnie.

title: The Lady Vanishes
simple_desc: While travelling in continental Europe, a rich young playgirl realizes that an elderly lady seems to have disappeared from the train.

title: The Killers
simple_desc: Hit men kill an unresisting victim, and investigator Reardon uncovers his past involvement with beautiful, deadly Kitty Collins.

title: Missing
simple_desc: When an idealistic American writer disappears during the Chilean coup d'état in September 1973, his wife and father try to find him.

title: Bad Day at Black Rock
simple_desc: A one-armed stranger comes to a tiny town possessing a terrible past they want to keep secret, by violent means if necessary.

title: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time
simple_desc: A high-school girl named Makoto acquires the power to travel back in time, and decides to use it for her own personal benefits. Little does she know that she is affecting the lives of others just as much as she is her own.

title: The Past
simple_desc: An Iranian man deserts his French wife and her two children to return to his homeland. Meanwhile, his wife starts up a new relationship, a reality her husband confronts upon his wife's request for a divorce.

title: Last Year at Marienbad
simple_desc: In a strange and isolated chateau, a man becomes acquainted with a woman and insists that they have met before.

title: Sicario
simple_desc: An idealistic FBI agent is enlisted by a government task force to aid in the escalating war against drugs at the border area between the U.S. and Mexico.

title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
simple_desc: As Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as "the property of the Half-Blood Prince" and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's dark past.

title: Inside Man
simple_desc: A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.

title: Searching
simple_desc: After his teenage daughter goes missing, a desperate father tries to find clues on her laptop.

title: Watchmen
simple_desc: In 1985 where former superheroes exist, the murder of a colleague sends active vigilante Rorschach into his own sprawling investigation, uncovering something that could completely change the course of history as we know it.

title: Saw
simple_desc: Two strangers awaken in a room with no recollection of how they got there, and soon discover they're pawns in a deadly game perpetrated by a notorious serial killer.

title: The Birds
simple_desc: A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.

title: Gone Baby Gone
simple_desc: Two Boston area detectives investigate a little girl's kidnapping, which ultimately turns into a crisis both professionally and personally.

title: Minority Report
simple_desc: In a future where a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes, an officer from that unit is himself accused of a future murder.

title: Sherlock Holmes
simple_desc: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

title: Dark City
simple_desc: A man struggles with memories of his past, which include a wife he cannot remember and a nightmarish world no one else ever seems to wake up from.

title: The Others
simple_desc: A woman who lives in her darkened old family house with her two photosensitive children becomes convinced that the home is haunted.

title: The Skin I Live In
simple_desc: A brilliant plastic surgeon, haunted by past tragedies, creates a type of synthetic skin that withstands any kind of damage. His guinea pig: a mysterious and volatile woman who holds the key to his obsession.

title: The Long Good Friday
simple_desc: An up-and-coming gangster is tested by the insurgence of an unknown, very powerful threat.

title: Lost Highway
simple_desc: Anonymous videotapes presage a musician's murder conviction, and a gangster's girlfriend leads a mechanic astray.

title: A Very Long Engagement
simple_desc: Tells the story of a young woman's relentless search for her fiancé, who has disappeared from the trenches of the Somme during World War One.

title: The 39 Steps
simple_desc: A man in London tries to help a counter-espionage agent, but when the agent is killed and the man stands accused, he must go on the run to save himself and stop a spy ring that is trying to steal top-secret information.

title: The Trial
simple_desc: An unassuming office worker is arrested and stands trial, but he is never made aware of his charges.

title: The Red Violin
simple_desc: A red-colored violin inspires passion, making its way through three centuries over several owners and countries, eventually ending up at an auction where it may find a new owner.

title: Detective Byomkesh Bakshy!
simple_desc: While investigating the disappearance of a chemist, a detective uncovers a larger conspiracy to unsettle Calcutta.

title: Promising Young Woman
simple_desc: A young woman, traumatized by a tragic event in her past, seeks out vengeance against those who crossed her path.

title: Eyes Wide Shut
simple_desc: A Manhattan doctor embarks on a bizarre, night-long odyssey after his wife's admission of unfulfilled longing.

title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
simple_desc: With their warning about Lord Voldemort's return scoffed at, Harry and Dumbledore are targeted by the Wizard authorities as an authoritarian bureaucrat slowly seizes power at Hogwarts.

title: The Conjuring
simple_desc: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

title: The Devil's Advocate
simple_desc: An exceptionally-adept Florida lawyer is offered a job at a high-end New York City law firm with a high-end boss--the biggest opportunity of his career to date.

title: Contact
simple_desc: Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.

title: Source Code
simple_desc: A soldier wakes up in someone else's body and discovers he's part of an experimental government program to find the bomber of a commuter train within 8 minutes.

title: We Need to Talk About Kevin
simple_desc: Kevin's mother struggles to love her strange child despite the increasingly dangerous things he says and does as he grows up. But Kevin is just getting started, and his final act will be beyond anything anyone imagined.

title: The Wicker Man
simple_desc: A puritan Police Sergeant arrives in a Scottish island village in search of a missing girl, who the Pagan locals claim never existed.

title: Hugo
simple_desc: In 1931 Paris, an orphan living in the walls of a train station gets wrapped up in a mystery involving his late father and an automaton.

title: Burning
simple_desc: Jong-su bumps into a girl who used to live in the same neighborhood, who asks him to look after her cat while she's on a trip to Africa. When back, she introduces Ben, a mysterious guy she met there, who confesses his secret hobby.

title: The Illusionist
simple_desc: In turn-of-the-century Vienna, a magician uses his abilities to secure the love of a woman far above his social standing.

title: The Abyss
simple_desc: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and faces danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
simple_desc: After being mistaken for an actor, a New York thief is sent to Hollywood to train under a private eye for a potential movie role, but the duo are thrown together with a struggling actress into a murder mystery.

title: The Long Goodbye
simple_desc: Private investigator Philip Marlowe helps a friend out of a jam, but in doing so gets implicated in his wife's murder.

title: Blow-Up
simple_desc: A fashion photographer unknowingly captures a death on film after following two lovers in a park.

title: The Omen
simple_desc: Mysterious deaths surround an American ambassador. Could the child that he is raising actually be the Antichrist? The Devil's own son?

title: Following
simple_desc: A young writer who follows strangers for material meets a thief who takes him under his wing.

title: The Secret of NIMH
simple_desc: To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she suspected.

title: Doubt
simple_desc: A Catholic school principal questions a priest's ambiguous relationship with a troubled young student.

title: The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
simple_desc: Wallace and his loyal dog, Gromit, set out to discover the mystery behind the garden sabotage that plagues their village and threatens the annual giant vegetable growing contest.

title: Who Am I
simple_desc: Benjamin, a young German computer whiz, is invited to join a subversive hacker group that wants to be noticed on the world's stage.
stars: ['Tom Schilling', "Elyas M'Barek", 'Wotan Wilke Möhring', 'Antoine Monot Jr.']

title: Deep Red
simple_desc: A jazz pianist and a wisecracking journalist are pulled into a complex web of mystery after the former witnesses the brutal murder of a psychic.

title: Tell No One
simple_desc: An accidental discovery near a doctor's estate stirs up some painful memories eight years after his wife's hideous murder, and now, things are bound to take a turn for the unexpected. Does the good doctor know more than he's letting on?

title: Death Note
simple_desc: A battle between the world's two greatest minds begins when Light Yagami finds the Death Note, a notebook with the power to kill, and decides to rid the world of criminals.

title: Spellbound
simple_desc: A psychiatrist protects the identity of an amnesia patient accused of murder while attempting to recover his memory.

title: On Body and Soul
simple_desc: When slaughterhouse workers Endre and Mária discover they share the same dreams, where they meet in a forest as deer and fall in love, they decide to make their dreams come true, but it's difficult in real life.

title: Remember
simple_desc: With the aid of a fellow Auschwitz survivor and a hand-written letter, an elderly man with dementia goes in search of the person he believes to be responsible for the death of his family in the death camp to kill him himself.

title: The Lady from Shanghai
simple_desc: Fascinated by gorgeous Mrs. Bannister, seaman Michael O'Hara joins a bizarre yachting cruise, and ends up mired in a complex murder plot.

title: Kiss Me Deadly
simple_desc: A doomed female hitchhiker pulls Mike Hammer into a deadly whirlpool of intrigue, revolving around a mysterious "great whatsit".

title: Hour of the Wolf
simple_desc: While vacationing on a remote German island with his younger pregnant wife, an artist has an emotional breakdown while confronting his repressed desires.

title: The Barbarian Invasions
simple_desc: During his final days, a dying man is reunited with old friends, former lovers, his ex-wife, and his estranged son.

title: Scream
simple_desc: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a masked killer who targets her and her friends by using scary movies as part of a deadly game.

title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
simple_desc: An ancient prophecy seems to be coming true when a mysterious presence begins stalking the corridors of a school of magic and leaving its victims paralyzed.

title: The Lighthouse
simple_desc: Two lighthouse keepers try to maintain their sanity while living on a remote and mysterious New England island in the 1890s.

title: Carrie
simple_desc: Carrie White, a shy, friendless teenage girl who is sheltered by her domineering, religious mother, unleashes her telekinetic powers after being humiliated by her classmates at her senior prom.

title: High Plains Drifter
simple_desc: A gun-fighting stranger comes to the small settlement of Lago and is hired to bring the townsfolk together in an attempt to hold off three outlaws who are on their way.

title: Palm Springs
simple_desc: Stuck in a time loop, two wedding guests develop a budding romance while living the same day over and over again.

title: Cloud Atlas
simple_desc: An exploration of how the actions of individual lives impact one another in the past, present and future, as one soul is shaped from a killer into a hero, and an act of kindness ripples across centuries to inspire a revolution.

title: Jacob's Ladder
simple_desc: Mourning his dead child, a haunted Vietnam War veteran attempts to uncover his past while suffering from a severe case of dissociation. To do so, he must decipher reality and life from his own dreams, delusions, and perceptions of death.

title: REC
simple_desc: A television reporter and cameraman follow emergency workers into a dark apartment building and are quickly locked inside with something terrifying.

title: The Wailing
simple_desc: Soon after a stranger arrives in a little village, a mysterious sickness starts spreading. A policeman, drawn into the incident, is forced to solve the mystery in order to save his daughter.

title: Forgotten
simple_desc: When his abducted brother returns seemingly a different man with no memory of the past 19 days, Jin-seok chases after the truth behind the kidnapping.

title: Calvary
simple_desc: After he is threatened during a confession, a good-natured priest must battle the dark forces closing in around him.

title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
simple_desc: Detective Sherlock Holmes is on the trail of criminal mastermind Professor Moriarty, who is carrying out a string of random crimes across Europe.

title: The Orphanage
simple_desc: A woman brings her family back to her childhood home, which used to be an orphanage for handicapped children. Before long, her son starts to communicate with an invisible new friend.

title: The Constant Gardener
simple_desc: A widower is determined to get to the bottom of a potentially explosive secret involving his wife's murder, big business, and corporate corruption.

title: Frequency
simple_desc: An accidental cross-time radio link connects father and son across 30 years. The son tries to save his father's life, but then must fix the consequences.

title: Picnic at Hanging Rock
simple_desc: During a rural summer picnic, a few students and a teacher from an Australian girls' school vanish without a trace. Their absence frustrates and haunts the people left behind.

title: Dolores Claiborne
simple_desc: A big city reporter travels to a small town where her mother has been arrested for the murder of an elderly woman for whom she worked as a housekeeper.

title: Mirage
simple_desc: Two storms separated by 25 years. A woman murdered. A daughter missed. Only 72 hours to discover the truth.

title: To Catch a Thief
simple_desc: A retired jewel thief sets out to prove his innocence after being suspected of returning to his former occupation.

title: Three Days of the Condor
simple_desc: A bookish CIA researcher in Manhattan finds all his co-workers dead, and must outwit those responsible until he figures out who he can really trust.

title: Blow Out
simple_desc: A movie sound recordist accidentally records the evidence that proves that a car accident was actually murder and consequently finds himself in danger.

title: K-PAX
simple_desc: PROT is a patient at a mental hospital who claims to be from a faraway planet named K-PAX. His psychiatrist tries to help him, only to begin to doubt his own explanations.

title: Lone Star
simple_desc: When the skeleton of his murdered predecessor is found, Sheriff Sam Deeds unearths many other long-buried secrets in his Texas border town.

title: A Shot in the Dark
simple_desc: A clumsy, inept detective is hired to investigate the murder of a chauffeur at a country home.

title: In the House
simple_desc: A high school French teacher is drawn into a precocious student's increasingly transgressive story about his relationship with a friend's family.

title: Thesis
simple_desc: While doing a thesis about violence, Ángela finds a snuff video where a girl is tortured until death. Soon she discovers that the girl was a former student in her faculty...

title: The Postman Always Rings Twice
simple_desc: A married woman and a drifter fall in love, then plot to murder her husband.

title: Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence
simple_desc: In the year 2032, Batô, a cyborg detective for the anti-terrorist unit Public Security Section 9, investigates the case of a female robot--one created solely for sexual pleasure--who slaughtered her owner.

title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa
simple_desc: An NRI and his wife decide to stay in his ancestral home, paying no heed to the warnings about ghosts. Soon, inexplicable occurrences cause him to call a psychiatrist to help solve the mystery.

title: Hereditary
simple_desc: A grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences.

title: The Ballad of Buster Scruggs
simple_desc: Six tales of life and violence in the Old West, following a singing gunslinger, a bank robber, a traveling impresario, an elderly prospector, a wagon train, and a perverse pair of bounty hunters.

title: Decision to Leave
simple_desc: A detective investigating a man's death in the mountains meets the dead man's mysterious wife in the course of his dogged sleuthing.

title: Irreversible
simple_desc: Events over the course of one traumatic night in Paris unfold in reverse-chronological order as the beautiful Alex is brutally raped and beaten by a stranger in an underpass tunnel.

title: Identity
simple_desc: Stranded at a desolate Nevada motel during a nasty rain storm, ten strangers become acquainted with each other when they realize that they're being killed off one by one.

title: Unbreakable
simple_desc: A man learns something extraordinary about himself after a devastating accident.
stars: ['Bruce Willis', 'Samuel L. Jackson', 'Robin Wright', 'Spencer Treat Clark']

title: The Conjuring 2
simple_desc: Ed and Lorraine Warren travel to North London to help a single mother raising four children alone in a house plagued by a supernatural spirit.

title: Sleepy Hollow
simple_desc: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of three people; the culprit is legendary apparition The Headless Horseman.

title: The Lincoln Lawyer
simple_desc: A lawyer defending a wealthy man begins to believe his client is guilty of more than just one crime.

title: Megamind
simple_desc: Evil genius Megamind finally defeats his do-gooder nemesis, Metro Man, but is left without a purpose in a superhero-free world.

title: The Adventures of Tintin
simple_desc: Intrepid reporter Tintin and Captain Haddock set off on a treasure hunt for a sunken ship commanded by Haddock's ancestor.

title: I Origins
simple_desc: A molecular biologist and his laboratory partner uncover evidence that may fundamentally change society as we know it.

title: The Negotiator
simple_desc: In a desperate attempt to prove his innocence, a skilled police negotiator accused of corruption and murder takes hostages in a government office to gain the time he needs to find the truth.

title: Pi
simple_desc: A paranoid mathematician searches for a key number that will unlock the universal patterns found in nature.

title: Murder by Death
simple_desc: Five famous literary detective characters and their sidekicks are invited to a bizarre mansion to solve an even stranger mystery.

title: The Hidden Face
simple_desc: Shattered by the unexpected news of their irreversible break-up, an aspiring orchestra conductor is puzzled by his girlfriend's mysterious and seemingly inexplicable case of disappearance. But can he look beyond the facts?
stars: ['Quim Gutiérrez', 'Martina García', 'María Soledad Rodríguez', 'Jose Luis Garcia']

title: Suspicion
simple_desc: A shy young heiress marries a charming gentleman, and soon begins to suspect he is planning to murder her.

title: Caché (Hidden)
simple_desc: A married couple is terrorized by a series of surveillance videotapes left on their front porch.

title: Bacurau
simple_desc: After the death of her grandmother, Teresa comes home to her matriarchal village in a near-future Brazil to find a succession of sinister events that mobilizes all of its residents.

title: Ghajini
simple_desc: A short-term memory loss patient sets out on his journey to avenge the death of his beloved girl.

title: The Three Burials of Melquiades Estrada
simple_desc: Ranch foreman Pete Perkins looks to fulfill the promise to his recently deceased best friend by burying him in his hometown in Mexico.

title: Manhattan Murder Mystery
simple_desc: A middle-aged couple suspects foul play when their neighbor's wife suddenly drops dead.

title: The Stranger
simple_desc: An investigator from the War Crimes Commission travels to Connecticut to find an infamous Nazi.

title: Where the Crawdads Sing
simple_desc: A woman who raised herself in the marshes of the Deep South becomes a suspect in the murder of a man with whom she was once involved.

title: Now You See Me
simple_desc: An F.B.I. Agent and an Interpol Detective track a team of illusionists who pull off bank heists during their performances, and reward their audiences with the money.

title: The Outfit
simple_desc: An expert cutter must outwit a dangerous group of mobsters in order to survive a fateful night.

title: Insomnia
simple_desc: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.

title: Clue
simple_desc: Six guests are anonymously invited to a strange mansion for dinner, but after their host is killed, they must cooperate with the staff to identify the murderer as the bodies pile up.

title: Manhunter
simple_desc: Former FBI profiler Will Graham returns to service to pursue a deranged serial killer dubbed "the Tooth Fairy" by the media.
